translation.en: [Ilonka] The next chapter.
That's something people say a lot,
translation.zh: ‎这是人们聊起自己的人生经历时

translation.en: talking about the stories of their lives.
translation.zh: ‎常提到的一句话 ‎（萨克拉门托 1994年）

translation.en: Turn the page. The past is prologue.
translation.zh: ‎“翻到下一页” 过去宛如序幕

translation.en: The next chapter. Like it's already been written.
translation.zh: ‎“下一章” 仿佛内容都已经写好了

translation.en: Like, the words are already there waiting for us.
translation.zh: ‎字字句句都在那里等着我们

translation.en: But I disagree.
We are the authors of our own stories.
Sure, we can't always control the plot, but we can decide who we want to be.
translation.zh: ‎“没错 有时剧情无法掌控 ‎但是可以决定自己想成为什么角色

translation.en: So to me, the next chapter just means
translation.zh: ‎所以在我看来 下一章意味着

translation.en: the endless possibilities of the blank page.
New beginnings. It doesn't matter who you…
translation.zh: ‎崭新的开始 不管你是谁…”

translation.en: We were in high school.
translation.zh: ‎“高中时期的我们是什么样的人

translation.en: The jock, the nerd, the weirdo, the criminal or the princess
translation.zh:
‎运动健将、书呆子
‎怪人、罪犯或公主

translation.en: or what plot twist got tossed our way.
It's time to turn the page and write the next chapter ourselves.
translation.zh: ‎都该翻页 自己创作下一个章节了”

translation.en: [Tim] It could be the compressor. Sure.
No, no. That's just the fan running.
translation.zh: ‎不对 那是风扇运转的声音

translation.en: How old did you say the unit is? For 4,000 square feet.
translation.zh: ‎你说这部装置使用几年了？ ‎370平方米要用的

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I could take a look at the wiring, but we may be looking at a replacement.
translation.zh:
‎对 我可以检查一下电线
‎不过可能需要更换

translation.en: How's 9:00 a.m. tomorrow?
Of course. Yeah, no problem.
Okay. Yeah.
All right. All right, Bill. Yeah. I'll see you then.
New client?
[laughs] New hair?
Wow, looks great. You'll look great in a cap and gown, too.
translation.zh: ‎真好看 配上学位服也好看

translation.en: Damn. I wish Maggie was here to see this.
translation.zh: ‎真是的 真希望玛姬看得到现在的你

translation.en: That's all she ever wanted, you know? For you to have your best go of it.
translation.zh:
‎你知道那是她唯一的愿望吧？
‎但你尽力就好

translation.en: Salutatorian means second best.
translation.zh: ‎代表毕业生致词意味着我只是第二名

translation.en: [Tim] Oh, just a second. Get out of here.
translation.zh: ‎只是第二名 ‎少来了 伊隆卡 你表现得很好

translation.en: Ilonka, you've done great, and you need to celebrate it.
translation.zh: ‎少来了 伊隆卡 你表现得很好 ‎得好好庆祝

translation.en: And you should also break a few rules, I think.
You know, just like once in your life. Just… Stop it, Tim.
translation.zh:
‎-这辈子总要疯一把…
‎-别说了 提姆

translation.en: The red looks badass.
Where's Josie?
Uh, she chickened out, and I kind of get it.
translation.zh: ‎她临阵脱逃 其实我懂她的顾虑

translation.en: What if they don't let us in?
-I mean-- -Lauren, this is our chance
translation.zh:
‎-我是说…
‎-萝伦 难得有机会

translation.en: to get a jump on a real college party.
Or we could start with a high school one since we kind of missed that boat
translation.zh:
‎也可以先参加高中派对
‎我们之前都错过了

translation.en: when we were being total nerds.
-Fuck high school. -[Lauren chuckles]
Um… Vodka soda, please.
-He's not a bartender. -It's fine.
You go here? You look a little young.
translation.zh:
‎你们是这里的学生吗？
‎看起来年纪有点小

translation.en: -Uh… -Thank you.
Oh, there they are.
I don't know why they need six types of rum over there and no water.
translation.zh:
‎真不知道那边为什么
‎要放六种兰姆酒 可是却没有水

translation.en: Yeah, half the water bottles in the kitchen were being used as ashtrays.
translation.zh:
‎这间厨房大半的水瓶
‎都被拿去当烟灰缸了

translation.en: So, you… you pacing yourself or you winding down?
translation.zh: ‎你是要慢慢喝 还是已经不喝了？

translation.en: Uh, I'm waiting for my friend. She's busy.
translation.zh: ‎我在等我的朋友 她很忙

translation.en: I think she's trying to make a couple of mistakes.
Uh, I'm Brian.
-Ilonka. -I don't think I've seen you around.
translation.zh:
‎-伊隆卡
‎-我好像没在这里见过你

translation.en: -I've kept to myself most of the year. -Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎我这一年都不太跟别人打交道

translation.en: What's your major?
-English. -Me too.
You don't say.
What were some of your favorite classes this year?
I'm gonna go with Romantic and Victorian literature.
translation.zh: ‎应该是浪漫与维多利亚文学

translation.en: -Yeah. I know that sounds like a line. -It sounds like a line.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道听起来像把妹台词
‎-的确像把妹台词

translation.en: But it isn't. No, I… I know it isn't, I do.
translation.zh:
‎-可是不是
‎-我知道不是 真的

translation.en: Romance and terror in the age of Victorian England.
translation.zh: ‎英国维多利亚时期的浪漫与恐怖

translation.en: That was one of my options for my senior thesis.
translation.zh: ‎那是我毕业论文的选项之一

translation.en: -One of your options? -See, I'm a sucker for Oscar Wilde.
translation.zh:
‎-你的选项之一？
‎-我对奥斯卡王尔德的作品很着迷

translation.en: A little "meh" on Stevenson. It's still love, just polite love.
translation.zh:
‎但不太喜欢史蒂文森的作品
‎我还是喜欢 但也仅此而已

translation.en: My favorite is Shelley. Mary, not her husband,
translation.zh: ‎我最爱的是雪莱 是玛丽 不是她丈夫

translation.en: Mary Shelley, the teenage girl who wrote Frankenstein.
translation.zh:
‎玛丽雪莱
‎写了《弗兰肯斯坦》的少女

translation.en: A teenage girl did that.
translation.zh: ‎此书居然出自一个少女之手

translation.en: She was… She was 19 when she became the mother of modern horror.
translation.zh: ‎她19岁就成为现代恐怖文学之母了

translation.en: I mean, she… she wrote the first major work in the science fiction genre.
translation.zh: ‎她写了科幻小说类别的第一本巨作

translation.en: Frankenstein is not only the first creation story to use science that way,
translation.zh:
‎《弗兰肯斯坦》不仅开创了
‎科幻小说的创作先河

translation.en: but to deal with the ethics of experiment and experimenter…
translation.zh: ‎还处理实验跟实验者伦理的问题…

translation.en: Sorry, that's, uh…
That's why I went with Shakespeare for my thesis. I…
translation.zh: ‎所以我选了莎士比亚当毕业论文题目

translation.en: I tend to ramble when I get going on Shelley.
translation.zh: ‎我一聊到雪莱就会滔滔不绝

translation.en: Jesus. Where have you been all semester?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 这学期怎么都没遇到你？

translation.en: Uh, so… so tell me about you.
What are some of your favorite…
Excuse me. What were-- [coughs]
Here. Here you go.
[Dr. Rowlands] Ilonka, did you hear me?
[sniffles] Sorry, I was just, um…
[breathing shakily] I'm sorry. I'm just distracted.
Can you say the name again? Like the name…
translation.zh: ‎可以再说一次病名吗？ ‎病名？麻烦再说一次实际的病名？

translation.en: Can you say the real name again, please?
translation.zh: ‎病名？麻烦再说一次实际的病名？

translation.en: Papillary thyroid carcinoma.
Right. Thyroid cancer.
[Ilonka] Uh, you said "treatable"?
[Dr. Rowlands] It can be. We need to know more.
translation.zh: ‎有可能 得进一步了解你的病情

translation.en: But the biopsy results tell me we should do an immediate thyroidectomy
translation.zh:
‎但切片结果显示
‎得马上进行甲状腺切除术

translation.en: and start you on radioactive iodine treatment.
[Ilonka] You want to remove my thyroid?
No. I'm… I'm going to Stanford. In the fall.
Stanford? I… [inhales sharply]
If we start this now, will it…
Will it be finished before the semester starts?
[Dr. Rowlands] It's hard to say.
We should just schedule the thyroidectomy.
translation.zh: ‎我们应该先安排甲状腺切除术

translation.en: So just walk me through the worst case.
Worst case. Just… [sniffs] …paint a picture.
translation.zh: ‎最糟的情况 让我稍微了解一下

translation.en: Talking about it is the best way to make sure it doesn't happen, isn't it?
translation.zh:
‎把问题讲开
‎才是避免问题发生的最佳办法 ‎对吧？

translation.en: Am I gonna need chemo?
Oh, kiddo, let's… let's not go there.
Ilonka, there are a lot of steps between here and chemo.
translation.zh:
‎伊隆卡 你要一步步来
‎化疗也不是一蹴而就的

translation.en: -Are the odds in my favor? -It's not quite that simple.
translation.zh: ‎我好转的机率高吗？ ‎没那么简单

translation.en: I mean, I was number two in a class of 900.
translation.zh: ‎我在九百人的班级里排名第二

translation.en: Youngest in my class too, and I skipped a year to get here.
translation.zh: ‎还是班上最年轻的 我跳级一年

translation.en: I was in the top two-tenths of 1 percent.
translation.zh: ‎我在1%的尖子生里位列前十分之二

translation.en: I'm good with odds.
I got this.
-♪ Happy birthday, dear Ilonka ♪ -♪ Happy birthday, dear Ilonka ♪
translation.zh: ‎祝你生日快乐 亲爱的伊隆卡

translation.en: -♪ Happy birthday to you ♪ -♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
What am I supposed…
I mean, the candles aren't lit.
Well, hospitals aren't exactly in love with open flames, so…
[exhales sharply] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎医院不喜欢明火 所以… ‎好吧

translation.en: -[Dr. Rowlands] Yay. -[Tim] Happy birthday, kiddo.
-Wait. Don't you have an install today? -[Tim] It's…
translation.zh:
‎-等等 你今天不用去安装设备吗？
‎-这…

translation.en: No. This is more important.
Don't lose another job for me.
This is more important.
[Ilonka] How is it?
[Lauren] Honestly, college is easier than high school, I mean.
translation.zh: ‎说真的 大学比高中轻松多了

translation.en: Less bullshit and more things that actually matter.
translation.zh:
‎少了很多废话
‎多了很多有意义的事情可做

translation.en: -[Dr. Rowlands] Tim, can I borrow you? -[Tim] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-提姆 可以过来一下吗？
‎-好

translation.en: Well, the food is shit, and, um, my foster dad is my only friend.
translation.zh: ‎伙食烂透了 ‎只有我的养父可以跟我当朋友

translation.en: But there is an orderly that has the hots for me, though.
translation.zh: ‎可是有个护理员对我“性”致勃勃

translation.en: -[Lauren] Well, is he cute? -Ugh! I'd rather die.
So I win.
Look, I got to go, but…
-Uh, cool. -Thanks for calling.
-It means a lot. -Happy birthday. And…
translation.zh:
‎-这对我意义重大
‎-生日快乐 还有…

translation.en: Basically, I'm… I'm afraid this round didn't do it.
translation.zh: ‎基本上 这一回合的治疗恐怕无效

translation.en: [Dr. Rowlands] The tumors in her lungs didn't respond the way we'd hoped.
translation.zh: ‎她肺部肿瘤的反应并不如我们的期望

translation.en: So we… we do it again? Another round.
Another round isn't going to make a difference at this point.
translation.zh: ‎现在再来一回合也不会有帮助

translation.en: [Tim] What, so you're saying that…
You're saying she's terminal.
Yes.
How long?
[Dr. Rowlands] It's tough to say.
[Tim] It's tough to fucking hear too, Doc. Give it a try.
translation.zh: ‎听你宣布噩耗也很痛苦 医生 ‎预估看看

translation.en: [Dr. Rowlands] I'd really prefer not to.
-Everyone is different, and-- -[Tim] She's 18 years old today.
translation.zh:
‎-每个人的情况都不同…
‎-她今天满18岁了

translation.en: Could she make it to 19?
Yes, she could. It's possible.
Yes.
[Tim] And, um, 20?
[Dr. Rowlands] We should talk about what you want to do next,
translation.zh: ‎应该讨论一下你接下来想怎么做

translation.en: though there isn't much else on my end besides making her comfortable.
translation.zh:
‎不过我能做的不多
‎只能尽量让她舒服一点

translation.en: [Ilonka] It's a special program and it's fully funded.
translation.zh: ‎这是个特殊方案 而且全额补助

translation.en: I mean, all of this, it's adding up.
Brightcliffe Hospice. You know what that means, right?
translation.zh: ‎“布莱克里夫安宁中心” ‎你知道这代表什么吧？

translation.en: Of course. But it's specifically for young people.
translation.zh: ‎那当然 但他们专门收年轻人

translation.en: One of the only places like it in the world.
They should be with their family, Ilonka.
translation.zh: ‎他们应该跟家人在一起 伊隆卡

translation.en: Lots of them don't have families according to the web.
translation.zh: ‎网站上的资料说他们多半都没有家人

translation.en: Lots of foster kids, kids on their own.
translation.zh: ‎很多都是被收养的小孩 无依无靠

translation.en: It's a place for teenagers to transition on their own terms.
This means no more treatments. No more trials, no more--
translation.zh: ‎这代表不再接受治疗、试验跟…

translation.en: None of that's working.
I promised Maggie.
I promised Maggie that I would take care of you.
And you did.
You did so good, Tim.
[Tim] Like I said, just a trial period.
translation.zh: ‎就像我说的 只是试住看看

translation.en: [Ilonka] So, like cancer Sleepaway Camp.
[Tim] I'll be at the Motel 6 in town.
translation.zh: ‎我会住镇上的六号汽车旅馆

translation.en: So, you know, just in case you change your mind,
which you can, of course, change your mind.
Come right home to Sacramento. Remember that.
translation.zh: ‎回到萨克拉门托的家 记住这一点

translation.en: Ilonka. Hey.
Hey, you okay, kiddo?
Yeah, just, uh…
Déjà vu.
Sorry. You're gonna think I'm a freak, but…
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 你可能觉得我是个怪人 但是…

translation.en: do… do I know you?
Yeah, I… I think so. You went to Franklin High, right?
translation.zh: ‎是 应该吧 ‎你是法兰克林高中毕业的吧？

translation.en: Or you were a… a patient at Seattle General?
translation.zh: ‎或是西雅图综合医院的病人？

translation.en: No, I'm from Sacramento.
translation.zh: ‎不是 我来自萨克拉门托

translation.en: Weird.
No, I've never been.
Uh… what are you in for?
Papillary thyroid carcinoma with lung metastasis,
translation.zh: ‎乳头状甲状腺癌 合并肺转移

translation.en: so, um…
thyroid cancer, I guess.
Leukemia, I guess.
It's nice to meet you.
Should I just call you Thyroid Cancer?
[chuckles] Sorry, I'm, um, Ilonka.
[Tim] Everything okay, sweetie?
Yeah, I'm fine. This is, um… Leukemia.
translation.zh: ‎对 没事 他叫白血病

translation.en: Kevin, nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you, Kevin. I'm Tim.
translation.zh: ‎幸会 凯文 我是提姆

translation.en: Well, should we go check out the inside and see what all the fuss is about?
translation.zh: ‎去里面看看这里为什么那么有名吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
[Kevin] Uh, well, uh, I'll see you around.
Maybe.
I mean, yep. I'll be here short term anyway.
translation.zh:
‎我是说没问题
‎反正我会在这儿待上一段时间

translation.en: -Ilonka, right? -[Ilonka] Yeppers.
Welcome to Brightcliffe.
I'm Mark, one of the nurse practitioners. Uh, Doc's inside waiting for you.
translation.zh:
‎我是马克
‎我是护士之一 医生在里面等你

translation.en: Come on, I'll help you with your bags.
-Thank you. -Yeah. How was the drive?
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-不客气 路途还顺利吗？

translation.en: [Tim] It's beautiful. [Mark] It can be a little dodgy at spots.
translation.zh:
‎-风景很美
‎-有些地方可能没那么美

translation.en: [Tim] You sure you're okay?
Yeah, yeah, it's nothing.
[Tim] Jeez. How old is this place?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 这间房子屋龄多大？

translation.en: Well, the house itself was built in--
That is right. Uh, by a logging industrialist, um…
Stanley Oscar Freelan.
Correct. And also his wife, Vera.
translation.zh: ‎没错 他太太薇拉也参与其中

translation.en: Uh, changed hands a few times over the years after that,
translation.zh: ‎后来这些年间易主过好几次

translation.en: until 1966, when Dr. Stanton bought it.
translation.zh: ‎直到1966年 史坦顿医生买了下来

translation.en: But before that, it was a halfway house in the Depression…
translation.zh:
‎但是在那之前
‎于经济大萧条期间当过中途之家

translation.en: -[Mark] Mm-hm. -…and a religious commune called the Paragon lived here in the '40s.
translation.zh:
‎1940年代
‎有个叫完人的宗教公社住在这里

translation.en: So, it was also a cult compound.
-I did not know that. -Yep, and it was…
Who's…
What?
It's, um…
It's… [breathes shakily]
There she is.
Welcome back, Ms. Pawluk.
[Tim] You're okay, sweetie.
[Dr. Stanton] Just a fainting spell.
Pretty common for someone with your diagnosis.
translation.zh: ‎罹患你这种疾病的人常有这种症状

translation.en: I thought I saw someone, an old lady.
translation.zh: ‎我以为我看到一个人 是个老太太

translation.en: I'm not exactly an ingenue, but "old" is pretty harsh.
translation.zh:
‎我称不上是纯真少女
‎不过说我老真的太伤人了

translation.en: [Ilonka] Not you, someone…
[sighs] Never mind.
I'm Dr. Georgina Stanton. Welcome to Brightcliffe.
translation.zh:
‎我是乔治娜史坦顿医生
‎欢迎来到布莱克里夫

translation.en: I'm sorry about earlier, Doc.
translation.zh: ‎稍早的事真的很抱歉 医生

translation.en: -[Ilonka] Earlier? -When you fainted.
He scooped you up and ran for the door,
which I completely understand.
It makes no sense.
No sense at all to leave her here.
To leave her here when she's sick.
Trust me. I know.
It's exactly how I felt when I lost my son Julian.
translation.zh: ‎我失去儿子朱利安时也是这种感觉

translation.en: I couldn't talk to parents in your situation if I hadn't been one myself.
translation.zh:
‎我也是过来人
‎所以才敢和同病相怜的家长们恳谈

translation.en: I'm sorry, I didn't… didn't realize.
The thing I didn't understand when we talk about cancer
translation.zh: ‎我不懂的是当我们提起癌症

translation.en: or any terminal illness, really.
Look at the language we use, the language of battle.
translation.zh: ‎看看我们用的都是什么语言 ‎用语都与战斗有关

translation.en: We're gonna fight this thing.
We're going to fight with everything we've got.
Be brave for the fight.
And then people say… they lost the battle.
It's so backwards.
I get it. To talk about the fight, it's active, it's visceral.
translation.zh:
‎我懂 谈起这场仗
‎能调动积极向上的真实情感

translation.en: Don't look at the hard part.
Look at all these shiny, sharp weapons we've developed all for you to try.
translation.zh:
‎把焦点放在寒光四射的锐器上
‎这是专为你们研发的

translation.en: Brightcliffe isn't about battles.
translation.zh: ‎布莱克里夫不讲求这种战斗的论述

translation.en: It's about permission to leave the battlefield.
translation.zh: ‎我们重视的是允许病人离开战场

translation.en: To focus on living instead of fighting.
translation.zh: ‎聚焦在生活 而非战斗上

translation.en: We aren't about a fight, and it's certainly isn't losing a battle.
translation.zh:
‎这不是一场仗
‎也绝对不是打输了战争

translation.en: Every living day here is a win.
translation.zh: ‎在这里生活的每一天都是一场胜利

translation.en: You and I can talk a little more, Tim, if you'd like.
translation.zh: ‎你要的话 我们可以深入讨论 提姆

translation.en: Maybe while Ilonka finishes her tour.
translation.zh:
‎或许在这期间
‎伊隆卡可以继续去参观

translation.en: Um, I'd like that.
So this is the dormitory.
Boys or girls?
Both. Boys and girls don't share rooms, of course,
translation.zh: ‎两者都有 当然不是男女混住一室

translation.en: but we don't see the need to quarantine them.
translation.zh: ‎可是我们觉得没必要隔离他们

translation.en: These young people are dealing with more than some adults ever will.
translation.zh:
‎这些年轻人面对的痛苦
‎远超过某些成人

translation.en: The least I can do is treat them like grown-ups.
translation.zh: ‎我至少可以把他们当大人看待

translation.en: This is Spence.
Spence, I'm designating you peer mentor for the afternoon.
translation.zh:
‎史宾赛
‎我要指定你今天下午来当前辈

translation.en: I was fifth in succession. What's happened to the others?
translation.zh: ‎我前面还有四个人 其他人呢？

translation.en: [Spence] Stick to it and don't get lost.
It's like a labyrinth in here, or like Vegas.
translation.zh:
‎这里的通道错综复杂
‎就像拉斯维加斯

translation.en: They don't want you to know what time it is, and they don't want you to get out.
translation.zh:
‎他们想把时间感变得很模糊
‎也不希望你离开

translation.en: Former patients of Brightcliffe, class of '66 on, all of them gone.
translation.zh:
‎那是布莱克里夫之前的病人
‎1966年那届的 都过世了

translation.en: Pushing daisies.
Depends on who you talk to, though.
The guy who gave me this tour, he's gone now.
But he used to call it the Ghost Tour.
translation.zh: ‎不过他以前都说这叫“鬼魅之旅”

translation.en: Do you believe in ghosts, newbie?
translation.zh: ‎你相信鬼魂存在吗 新来的？

translation.en: [chuckles] Does it matter?
Depends on your career ambitions, I guess.
Myself, I've got my fingers crossed.
I'll be an entry-level poltergeist.
Only fun if we get to fuck with people.
translation.zh: ‎只有恶搞活人才能让我快乐

translation.en: [Spence] You coming?
Yeah.
Group therapy will be in here. A bunch of therapies, actually.
translation.zh:
‎团体治疗都在这里进行
‎其实有很多疗程

translation.en: These two are doing some new Age-y thing called yoga,
translation.zh: ‎她们两个在进行叫瑜伽的新时代疗法

translation.en: which is Hindi for "bullshit".
translation.zh: ‎在印度语里是胡说八道的意思

translation.en: That's Natsuki, ovarian cancer, and that's Sandra, lymphoma.
translation.zh:
‎那是夏树 罹患卵巢癌
‎而那是珊卓 罹患淋巴癌

translation.en: Sandra is kind of a Jesus freak, speaking of bullshit,
translation.zh:
‎说到胡说八道
‎珊卓是个狂热的基督徒

translation.en: and she gets weird if you mention her wig.
translation.zh: ‎而且提到她的假发 她就会怪怪的

translation.en: No judgment. Whatever works.
translation.zh:
‎我不批评任何人
‎每个人觉得有用就好

translation.en: We all got our poison to pick.
This is my poison.
Yeah, the library is tough to beat.
Whole thing was donated from a local library before it closed,
translation.zh:
‎这是一间本地图书馆
‎关门大吉之前捐赠的

translation.en: so it's like a proper library, just as hard to navigate.
translation.zh:
‎就像真正的图书馆
‎找起书籍来一样困难

translation.en: It's got a card catalog and everything.
But wait till you to see what's next.
[Spence] Amesh, new girl. Hey, there.
translation.zh:
‎-艾米石 她是新来的
‎-你好

translation.en: Glioblastoma.
Oh, gesundheit.
-I'm Ilonka. -[whispers] Fuck.
Ilonka, hi. I'm so, so glad I'm not the new kid anymore.
translation.zh: ‎伊隆卡 你好 ‎很高兴我不再是这里的菜鸟了

translation.en: Welcome. This is an excellent day for me.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎 今天对我来说真是太棒了

translation.en: -[Spence] Amesh has been here… -Two months.
translation.zh:
‎-艾米石已经在这里待了…
‎-两个月

translation.en: …two months and I think he's been…
Two months of the new kid jokes.
-[Amesh] The constant hazing. -There isn't any hazing.
There's none hazing.
But he keeps bringing it up,
keeps asking us when the hazing starts and we keep telling him -this isn't a frat house. -I mean,
translation.zh:
‎一直问我们何时会开始欺负他
‎我们不断强调这里不是兄弟会会所

translation.en: I don't get to go to college. I don't think I'm asking for much.
translation.zh:
‎我是说 我没机会上大学
‎我的要求应该不多吧？

translation.en: Could have at least tried to do some hazing.
I don't know why you can't agree with me, dude.
translation.zh: ‎你为什么就不能附和我 老兄？

translation.en: You haven't seen her in a bikini.
translation.zh: ‎你又没看过她穿比基尼的模样

translation.en: Well, Lydia's all yours.
You've got some old elevator. I've only ever seen these in the movies.
translation.zh: ‎好老旧的电梯 我只在电影里看过

translation.en: Just the one.
Oh, you want to take a ride? Just… just hit the B button.
translation.zh:
‎要搭乘吗？
‎只要按下地下室的按钮就好

translation.en: Dude, I said no hazing.
translation.zh: ‎老兄 不是说不能欺负人了吗？

translation.en: I'll take a ride.
-What's in the basement? -Oh, man, I dare you.
translation.zh:
‎-地下室有什么东西？
‎-天啊 赌你不敢去

translation.en: No, he doesn't.
-Dude, finally some hazing. -Shut up.
translation.zh:
‎-老兄 终于有机会了
‎-闭嘴

translation.en: Bring it. I did three rounds of chemo. Takes a lot to scare me.
translation.zh:
‎放马过来吧 我做了三回合化疗
‎我没那么容易被吓到

translation.en: [Amesh] No, wait. Don't. Don't.
Don't actually go down there.
-Don't. -It's the morgue.
Guess I didn't think of that.
[Ilonka] That makes sense, doesn't it?
I'd stay out of the elevator in general. It's possessed.
translation.zh:
‎换做是我
‎就会远离所有电梯 电梯闹鬼

translation.en: [Spence] Pops on and off, goes up and down at night all by itself.
translation.zh: ‎进进出出 晚上还会自己上上下下

translation.en: Something wrong with the wiring.
It's old, but I'd stay out.
[Amesh] You know what? I get it now.
This is not a good place to do hazing.
translation.zh: ‎不适合在这里欺负新来的人

translation.en: -Yeah. -It's just mean.
Remind me to thank everybody.
[Ilonka] That's beautiful. Don't stop.
Did you write that?
You know what? I did.
-You new? -I'm Ilonka.
Cheri. Nice to meet.
[Amesh] Okay, I don't know much about music,
but I can almost guarantee she did not write that.
translation.zh:
‎但我几乎敢打包票
‎那不是她自己作的曲子

translation.en: -That's Cheri. You've got to watch out. -Yeah, watch out.
translation.zh: ‎那是雪莉 你最好小心一点 ‎对 小心一点

translation.en: One time she told me she was a flight attendant,
and I believed her for more than a day.
translation.zh: ‎我傻傻地信了 一天后才发现不对劲

translation.en: We don't know much about Cheri. Her story keeps changing.
translation.zh:
‎我们对雪莉了解不多
‎她的故事变来变去的

translation.en: Only thing I can say for sure is the day she arrived,
translation.zh: ‎我唯一能确定的是她来的那天

translation.en: she rode up with two moving trucks and her nanny was driving a Bentley.
translation.zh:
‎她带了两辆搬家卡车
‎她的保姆还开宾利

translation.en: Everything she said since, grain of salt, at best.
translation.zh:
‎我们对她之后说的话
‎顶多都只能半信半疑

translation.en: All yours. Well, yours and Anya's.
translation.zh: ‎这里全属于你 ‎应该说是你跟安雅的

translation.en: She was supposed to be here for introductions.
translation.zh: ‎她原本应该在这里跟你自我介绍的

translation.en: And in fact, I think she was supposed to do your tour.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 她应该负责带你参观

translation.en: [Spence] But, well, Anya is Anya.
Uh, dinner is in the conservatory at 7, if you're feeling up to it.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想的话 7点在温室吃晚餐

translation.en: Otherwise, you can have it delivered.
Do not use your bedpan. Uh, they're in every room for some reason,
translation.zh: ‎不要用便盆 不知为何 每间房间都有

translation.en: and they really don't want you to use it unless you really have--
translation.zh: ‎他们不希望我们使用 除非…

translation.en: Let's go.
They're apparently decorative, is what I'm saying.
translation.zh: ‎我的意思是那显然没有实质用途

translation.en: Come in.
[Tim] Well, I guess your mind's made up, huh?
Guess we can put these bags back in the car.
translation.zh: ‎也可以把这些行李放回车上

translation.en: We drive all night, be home by morning.
translation.zh: ‎彻夜开车 早上就会到家了

translation.en: How was Dr. Stanton?
Well, truth be told, she was great.
She actually reminded me a little of Maggie.
I'm supposed to be dropping you off at college, not this.
translation.zh:
‎我应该送你去念大学
‎不是来这里才对

translation.en: Well, it's not too much of a stretch.
-Some serious Ivy League vibes here. -[Tim chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎这里也有常春藤名校的氛围

translation.en: Just think about it that way, if it helps.
translation.zh: ‎如果有帮助的话 就这么想吧

translation.en: [Ilonka] What the fuck?
-[Anya] What are you doing? -Oh. Ow.
Sorry, there's a…
I'm Ilonka.
Thyroid cancer.
With, uh… with lung metastasis.
translation.zh: ‎罹患甲状腺癌 合并… ‎合并肺转移

translation.en: -You're Anya, yeah? -Yeah.
[Anya] You're going to read all those?
Yeah. I was supposed to start college in the fall,
translation.zh: ‎对 我原本要在秋天进大学的

translation.en: trying to keep up with my syllabus.
[Anya murmurs] Fucking shite.
So there's, uh…
There's weird symbols under my bed in chalk.
translation.zh: ‎我的床底下有粉笔画的诡异符号

translation.en: -[Anya] Yeah? -Do you, uh… Do you know why?
Rachel, I expect.
Rachel? [Anya] Roommate Rachel.
She was super into Wiccan stuff.
Toward the end.
Well, we all need something, right?
translation.zh: ‎每个人都各有所需 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
Ten grams of morphine for me. [sighs]
[Ilonka] Well, I… I get it.
Not necessarily like Wicca, but there's something to magical thinking.
translation.zh: ‎不一定是威卡教的东西 ‎但魔法的思维很吸引人

translation.en: Yeah, and it sure didn't work for Rachel. The bitch is dead.
translation.zh: ‎对 而且那显然对瑞秋来说没用 ‎那女的死了

translation.en: But, hey, why not leave them there? Go for double jeopardy.
translation.zh:
‎但何不把它留在那地方呢？
‎进一步继续挑战人生

translation.en: Where the scores can really change.
Well, it was great to meet… you.
Uh, do I go to the kitchen or…
[Kevin] No. They'll bring it. Made special.
translation.zh: ‎不用 他们会端过来 都是特制的

translation.en: They talked to your doctor about that already,
translation.zh: ‎他们已经跟你的医生讨论过了

translation.en: but you can change the menu if you want.
translation.zh: ‎但你要的话可以更换餐点内容

translation.en: We didn't meet officially. I'm Sandra.
translation.zh:
‎我们还没正式见过 ‎-我是珊卓
‎-伊隆卡 幸会

translation.en: Ilonka. Nice to meet you.
I like your, uh…
-[Ilonka] I like your hair. -Thanks.
Yours too. I mean, you look terrific.
translation.zh: ‎你的也是 我是说 你看起来美极了

translation.en: I'm Natsuki. Welcome.
[Ilonka] How long have you all been here?
-Four months for me. -Five.
-Three. -Three.
Sixty-three days, 17 hours and 11 minutes.
You don't know the minutes.
Sandra and Anya are the seniors here.
translation.zh: ‎珊卓跟安雅在这里待很久了

translation.en: You've both been here almost…
-Almost six months? -Almost six.
More than six. Actually, I just got re-upped.
Got my double D. Thank God.
Yeah, I got to do that.
-Double D? -Double diagnosis.
Still dying. Confirmed.
translation.zh: ‎还是一样快死了 已经确认了

translation.en: Insurance pays for hospice in six-month increments.
translation.zh: ‎保险给付的安宁费用是每六个月递增

translation.en: So if you're still here in six months, you got to go in for an exam.
translation.zh:
‎所以如果你六个月后还在这里
‎你就得去做体检

translation.en: [Cheri] This is a hospice?
My parents told me this was a boarding school.
[Sandra] They wouldn't really throw you out.
Dr. Stanton wouldn't throw us out.
translation.zh: ‎史坦顿医生不会把我们赶走的

translation.en: Just because it's got a morgue in the basement
doesn't mean it's not a business.
So how did you end up here?
I sort of found Brightcliffe on my own.
translation.zh: ‎我算是自己找到布莱克里夫的

translation.en: I sent in an application, did an interview with Stanton over the phone,
translation.zh:
‎我寄出申请书
‎在电话上接受史坦顿访谈

translation.en: and she said there was an opening.
[Anya] That opening was Rachel, I guess.
Hm. Yeah, I didn't really get to know Rachel.
She was in full cranky ass bitch mode by the time you got here.
translation.zh:
‎你来的时候
‎她已经变得很暴躁不安了

translation.en: And the whole witchcraft thing?
If cancer didn't take her out, someone was going to drop a house on her.
translation.zh:
‎就算她没有因癌症而死
‎也会有人杀了她

translation.en: I think God will forgive her for the witchcraft stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我想神应该会原谅她接触巫术

translation.en: Jesus Christ. Rachel was a Wiccan.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 瑞秋信的是威卡教

translation.en: If she was a heretic, I'm going straight to hell.
translation.zh: ‎她是异教徒 我一定会直接下地狱

translation.en: Only God knows what's in someone's heart in the end,
translation.zh: ‎只有神知道一个人死前心里在想什么

translation.en: and I like to think He'll find yours is way more full of love than you let on.
translation.zh:
‎我认为他会发现你心里充满了爱
‎只是你都不表现出来

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -Oh, no.
[Anya] Rachel was getting real dark towards the end.
translation.zh: ‎瑞秋死前整个人变得很黑暗

translation.en: I didn't tell you guys the weird shit she was saying.
translation.zh: ‎我都没提过她说了什么胡言乱语

translation.en: She said that she could feel something following her like a living shadow.
translation.zh:
‎她说她感觉得到有某个东西跟着她
‎宛如活生生的鬼影

translation.en: And every time she turned around, gone.
translation.zh: ‎她每次转过身 那个鬼影就不见了

translation.en: You can't scare me, Anya.
[Anya] The night before she died, she came running into our room.
translation.zh: ‎她死前一晚冲进我们的房间

translation.en: I don't know how she ran at all.
She was in real bad shape by then.
translation.zh: ‎她那个时候的状态已经差到不行了

translation.en: She said it almost got her that time.
translation.zh: ‎她说它那次差点就抓到她了

translation.en: That she could feel its fingers touching her shirt.
translation.zh: ‎她感觉得到它的手指触碰她的上衣

translation.en: That it was that close.
And she cried and cried.
And she said she knew that she wouldn't be able to escape it.
translation.zh: ‎她说她知道她一定逃不过鬼影的魔掌

translation.en: Not again.
And the next day she died.
-Why do you always do that? -Do what?
It's scary enough without that.
translation.zh: ‎不用听你乱说就已经够可怕了

translation.en: You've got nothing to fear, right? I mean, you've got Jesus on your side.
translation.zh:
‎你又不用怕 对吧？
‎我是说 耶稣站在你这边

translation.en: [Kevin] Sandra, you know what it is.
translation.zh: ‎珊卓 你知道情况是怎么样的

translation.en: Rachel was on a lot of drugs towards the end.
The drugs do a number.
You got to take what people say with a grain of salt.
I mean, people see ghosts, hear voices.
I've heard three or four versions of that "Living Shadow" story
translation.zh:
‎那个“活生生的鬼影”的故事 ‎我来这里之后
‎已经听过三到四个版本了

translation.en: since I got here.
translation.zh:
‎我来这里之后
‎已经听过三到四个版本了

translation.en: [Spence] She was tripping balls.
Relax, Sandra. You're just an easy mark.
translation.zh: ‎别紧张 珊卓 你太容易受骗了

translation.en: Somebody say Mark? 10:00 p.m., lights out, new girl.
translation.zh: ‎好像有人叫我？ ‎晚上10点熄灯 新来的

translation.en: No wandering around, all right?
translation.zh: ‎不可以在外游荡 知道吗？

translation.en: Doc gives you a lot of leeway, but safety is no accident.
translation.zh:
‎医生给了你活动的余裕
‎但安全并非偶然

translation.en: Therefore, there is a strict curfew.
There's only one person on the night desk.
If you fall downstairs or something, we might not hear you.
translation.zh:
‎所以要是你们摔下楼梯之类的
‎我们可能会听不见

translation.en: Oh, fuck right off, Mark.
Okay. Anyone need anything else?
translation.zh: ‎好 还有谁需要什么东西吗？

translation.en: We're good.
What was that about?
-Yeah. Spence kind of hates Mark. -Why?
Well, he's young and cute and funny, and he ain't dying.
translation.zh: ‎他年轻英俊又风趣 而且没罹患绝症

translation.en: What's not to hate?
[Kevin] You didn't even invite her.
Right off the cuff. She was asleep.
[Anya] Besides, I'm not sure about her.
Hey, well, you said that about me.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你之前也是这么说我的

translation.en: And I was right. Half your stories are just old episodes of Doctor Who.
translation.zh:
‎我说得对 你的故事
‎大多只是重复《神秘博士》的旧剧情

translation.en: I really wish you wouldn't.
We've been through this.
Yeah, but that was before I found two bottles of Stanton's private stash.
translation.zh:
‎对 但我后来发现
‎两瓶史坦顿的私人收藏

translation.en: [Sandra] But you shouldn't mix it with the meds.
[Anya] No, you shouldn't mix it with lorazepam.
translation.zh: ‎不对 你才不该跟萝拉西泮混着喝

translation.en: Don't yuck my yums.
-What's it going to do? Kill me? -[Natsuki] Yes, it could.
Best case, it makes you pass the fuck out at the table
translation.zh:
‎最好的情况就是让你在桌边昏过去
‎连续三天都痛不欲生

translation.en: and feel like shit for three days. Like last time.
translation.zh:
‎最好的情况就是让你在桌边昏过去
‎连续三天都痛不欲生 ‎-就像上次
‎-我用闻的就好

translation.en: -I'm just going to smell it. -[chuckles]
Oh, I'll have a glass too, just to smell it.
translation.zh: ‎也给我一杯 我只是要闻闻看

translation.en: -Me too. -Yes, me as well.
Can't even really smell it.
How about it, Natsuki?
I'm dying to hear the next chapter.
Phrasing.
Where did I leave off?
He was walking home after the concert.
-[Sandra] I don't like this one. -[Anya] For fuck's sake.
No offense, Natsuki, you're telling it beautifully.
translation.zh: ‎恕我直言 夏树 你讲得很精彩

translation.en: -Thank you. -It's just creepy.
Yours are always so creepy.
Deal with it. I sat through three full nights of your angel porn.
translation.zh:
‎忍耐一下 我听你讲了
‎整整三晚的天使情色小说

translation.en: She's got you there, Sandra.
I thought you guys liked my angel story.
translation.zh:
‎-我以为你们喜欢我的天使故事
‎-不

translation.en: All right, then.
To those before. To those after.
translation.zh: ‎敬那些先来 敬那些后到

translation.en: To us now and to those beyond.
translation.zh: ‎敬现在的我们和跨越凡间的诸位

translation.en: [all] To those before. To those after.
translation.zh: ‎敬那些先来 敬那些后到

translation.en: To us now and to those beyond.
translation.zh: ‎敬现在的我们和跨越凡间的诸位

translation.en: Seen or unseen, here but not here.
translation.zh: ‎被看见或不被看见 在此却又不在此

translation.en: [all] Seen or unseen. Here but not here.
translation.zh: ‎被看见或不被看见 在此却又不在此

translation.en: All right, the concert's over, and Ren is walking home.
translation.zh: ‎好 演唱会结束 伦正步行回家

translation.en: He didn't plan on staying so late,
but he heard that strange music coming from the Fine Arts wing,
translation.zh: ‎但他听到奇怪的音乐声 ‎从艺廊那侧传过来

translation.en: And hadn't expected it to be coming from that empty classroom.
translation.zh: ‎他没想到会来自那间空的教室

translation.en: So now, walking home, he's hearing it on the wind.
translation.zh: ‎现在 在步行回家途中 ‎他在风的来向上也听到了

translation.en: He suddenly realized he didn't recognize the street,
translation.zh: ‎他突然意识到这条街好陌生

translation.en: didn't recognize these houses.
But he made this walk every day.
translation.zh: ‎可是他每天都会步行经过这里

translation.en: It was muscle memory to him.
It didn't make sense.
And then, that same melody, so familiar, like he knew every note
translation.zh:
‎接着 响起了同一首旋律 ‎熟悉到他完全知道
‎接下来要听到的每一个音符

translation.en: that he was about to hear.
translation.zh:
‎熟悉到他完全知道
‎接下来要听到的每一个音符

translation.en: So, so familiar.
Then he feels himself being watched.
Not from the street.
The street's empty.
No. The windows, all of them.
translation.zh: ‎不是 是窗户 ‎所有的窗户 每一扇都是

translation.en: Every single window framing a face like a portrait gallery.
translation.zh: ‎所有的窗户 每一扇都是 ‎框住了一张脸 宛如肖像画艺廊

translation.en: All smiling, all watching him.
He should run, he thinks, run back the way he came.
translation.zh:
‎他认为他应该赶快跑
‎跑回原本的地方

translation.en: But the music is back.
It's in his ear. It's in his head. And then another sound.
translation.zh:
‎回荡在他耳中跟脑中
‎后来又出现另一个声音…

translation.en: Are you lost?
You look lost.
I'm…
I don't know where I am. I…
translation.zh: ‎我不知道这是什么地方 我…

translation.en: I don't know where I am.
Can you just point me--
[girl] Are you lost?
[Spence] Wait.
Don't be lazy.
-You scared? -Startled isn't the same as scared.
Anyone can bang pots and pans behind someone's head.
translation.zh: ‎谁都可以在别人背后制造声响

translation.en: That's not scary. It's just startling.
translation.zh: ‎那并不可怕 只会让人吓一跳

translation.en: And it's lazy as fuck. Maybe.
But when that happens, it actually releases a burst of adrenaline and…
translation.zh:
‎但在那个时候
‎肾上腺素会突然释出 而且…

translation.en: -[cat screeches] -Fuck!
Come on. Did you just fucking black cat scare us?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 你用黑猫那招吓我们？

translation.en: You do that first? Not at the end.
translation.zh:
‎那种桥段要先出现吧？
‎不要安排在最后

translation.en: [Natsuki] You're right.
The point is, except for that harmless cat,
the street was empty.
And you remember what that teacher had said?
translation.zh: ‎你记得那个老师说了什么吗？

translation.en: How she tried to warn him about that melody.
translation.zh: ‎她是如何警告他要注意那段旋律的

translation.en: What she said about how some music finds its way into your head.
How you can't stop yourself from hearing it once you've heard it.
translation.zh:
‎一旦听过了
‎我就无法让音乐从你脑中消失

translation.en: How it plays on and on, and how she tried…
translation.zh: ‎现在音乐会不断重播 ‎而她试着…

translation.en: What the fuck was that?
Well, shit, new girl, might as well come out. [Anya] Fuck.
translation.zh:
‎-该死 新来的 干脆就出来了吧
‎-该死

translation.en: I knew you weren't asleep.
I thought no one was allowed out at night.
We're not.
So, what is this?
-It's kind of a club. -Shh!
Give me the wine.
Take a sip.
I'm… I'm good. I--
Take a sip.
I can't. I'm on meds.
You're on Acetaminophen. And what? Haldol? You can have a sip.
translation.zh: ‎你吃的是乙醯胺酚跟什么？好度锭？ ‎喝一口没关系

translation.en: Drink the contraband, and maybe you're in the club.
translation.zh: ‎喝了违禁品 或许我们就会让你加入

translation.en: Forget about it otherwise, nobody rides for free.
translation.zh:
‎不然就算了
‎每个人都得付出一点代价

translation.en: Oh, come on. She's here already.
At this point, she's either a member of the club or a witness for the prosecution.
translation.zh:
‎此时要么让她加入社团
‎不然她就会去作证告发我们

translation.en: The Midnight Club.
I'm not sure if that's what they called it originally,
translation.zh: ‎不知道是不是原本就叫这名字

translation.en: but that's what it was called when I got here.
translation.zh: ‎不过我来的时候就是用这个名称

translation.en: So you guys sneak into the library every night and…
translation.zh: ‎所以你们每晚偷跑进图书馆 然后…

translation.en: Make ghosts.
-Tell stories. -"Make ghosts" sounds way better.
You tell a story, you're giving birth to a new ghost because…
translation.zh:
‎讲了故事
‎就能催生出新的鬼魂 因为…

translation.en: That's all any of us are in the end.
Stories.
[Amesh] Hmm. Yeah, speaking of which,
Natsuki is in the middle of a barn burner.
translation.zh: ‎夏树正在讲高潮迭起的故事

translation.en: It's been going on for three days now,
and it's finally devolved into a pile of bullshit jump scares.
translation.zh:
‎终于变成
‎一堆烂到极点的突发惊吓桥段

translation.en: Quiet, you. There's actually more to the club than just the stories.
translation.zh:
‎-你别吵
‎-这个社团不只是在讲故事

translation.en: One pretty huge thing, actually.
Hey, she hasn't had any wine.
She hasn't told a single story, so, yeah.
You want to be in the club? Ante up.
Tell us a story right now and drink the fuck up.
translation.zh: ‎赶快讲故事 也把酒喝掉

translation.en: Like I said before, nobody rides for free.
translation.zh:
‎就像我之前说的
‎要加入就得付出代价

translation.en: Well, actually, Cheri rides for free.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 雪莉没有付出代价

translation.en: -[laughter] -I was gonna say that.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 雪莉没有付出代价 ‎我正要这么说

translation.en: Cheri hasn't told a single story yet and it's been three months.
translation.zh:
‎雪莉连一个故事都没说过
‎她已经加入三个月了

translation.en: [Cheri] I'm working on it.
Still editing, fixing it in post.
translation.zh: ‎“还在编辑 后制还没完成”

translation.en: That's what my dad says all the time.
He's a famous movie producer.
Cheri's full of goddamned stories.
Just never in the club.
Hmm. But other than Cheri, nobody rides for free.
translation.zh: ‎但除了雪莉以外 每个人都得付出

translation.en: What kind of story?
No rules there, though there does seem to be a theme.
translation.zh: ‎没有规则 不过似乎有个主题

translation.en: We generally try to scare the shit out of each other.
translation.zh: ‎我们通常都会想办法吓死彼此

translation.en: Not all of us. Well, the interesting ones, anyway.
translation.zh:
‎-不是所有人都这样
‎-至少有趣的人会

translation.en: They ain't easy, you know,
scaring someone who's already been given the worst news they'll ever get.
translation.zh: ‎吓唬早就已经得知噩耗的人

translation.en: We're a tough fucking audience.
Okay, well… [inhales sharply]
…how's this?
Story's about a young woman who found out she was dying.
translation.zh:
‎这些故事描写的是
‎一位发现自己不久于人世的年轻女子

translation.en: Oh, fuck off.
Boring. We try not to do that here. It's a little masturbatory.
translation.zh:
‎无聊死了 那不是我们要讲的故事
‎每个人都会轮到

translation.en: Wait, hey, it's not what you think.
translation.zh: ‎等等 不是你们想的那样

translation.en: Her name was Julia Jayne
and she was born in 1951 in Lewiston, Idaho.
It was her junior year when she met Nathan.
And it was… It was the kind of love
when suddenly all the love songs are about you.
translation.zh: ‎就像是所有的情歌都在讲自己的故事

translation.en: [Ilonka] 1968 was the year she fell in love.
It was also the year she found out she had thyroid cancer.
translation.zh: ‎她那年也发现自己罹患甲状腺癌

translation.en: Less than a year at the most.
[Ilonka] Julia was 17, and she lived with her elderly grandmother,
translation.zh: ‎茱莉亚当时17岁 跟年长的奶奶同住

translation.en: who was so on in years, she was barely herself.
translation.zh:
‎她多年来接受各种治疗
‎几乎变了一个人

translation.en: Thyroidectomy, it metastasized, radiation,
translation.zh: ‎甲状腺切除术、转移、放射治疗

translation.en: and finally there was no other option
and she wound up at a hospice.
A new private hospice to wait it out.
translation.zh: ‎一间新的私人安宁中心 ‎来等死亡降临

translation.en: [Julia] May 20th, 1969.
Zero-five-two-zero-one-nine-six-nine. Zero-five-two-zero-one-nine-six-nine.
[Ilonka] She obsessed over the date.
[Ilonka] One year after her diagnosis,
the date she figured might be the end for her.
translation.zh: ‎她认为自己的死期可能是那一天

translation.en: Zero-five-two-zero-one-nine-six-nine.
[Ilonka] She missed Nathan with all of herself,
sometimes late at night,
she swore she could hear him calling out for her.
translation.zh: ‎她发誓她听得到他呼唤她的声音

translation.en: Julia.
[Ilonka] The next day, Julia didn't turn up for breakfast.
They searched the whole house, and she was nowhere to be found.
translation.zh:
‎他们搜索整间屋子
‎却没有发现她的踪影

translation.en: -[man 1] Julia! -[man 2] Julia!
[Ilonka] Another day and a police report is filed.
translation.zh: ‎又过了一天 他们便报了警

translation.en: Julia Jayne was a sleepwalker
and they were worried she'd wandered out at night.
translation.zh: ‎他们担心她在晚上跑出去了

translation.en: Worst case, wandered too close to the cliff,
translation.zh: ‎最糟的情况是她离悬崖太近

translation.en: into the ocean.
Days turn into weeks and then a month later…
translation.zh: ‎几天后来变成了几周 ‎接着一个月后…

translation.en: [Ilonka] When asked where she had been all that time, Julia said…
translation.zh:
‎被问到那段时间
‎她去了哪里时 茱莉亚说…

translation.en: I never left the house.
[Ilonka] Soon after she returned, her tumors started to shrink
translation.zh: ‎她回来后 肿瘤就开始缩小

translation.en: and then somehow they disappeared.
Word spread that she'd been leaving. Her prognosis changed.
translation.zh: ‎大家听说她要离开了 ‎她的预后改变了 她不会死了

translation.en: She was gonna live.
translation.zh: ‎她的预后改变了 她不会死了

translation.en: But before she left the hospice, one last thing.
translation.zh: ‎但她离开安宁中心前还有一件事要做

translation.en: Zero-nine-one-four-one-nine-seven-zero.
One-one-two-five-one-nine-seven-one.
Julia, the doctor wants to see you.
Zero-two-zero-six-one-nine-eight-nine.
Zero-two-zero-six-one-nine-eight-nine.
Zero-two-zero-six-one-nine-eight-nine.
[Ilonka] It seemed like gibberish until…
translation.zh: ‎她听起来像是在胡言乱语 直到…

translation.en: on September 14, 1970...
Zero-nine-one-four-one-nine-seven-zero.
...that young woman died in her bed.
-And on November 25th, a year later… -One-one-two-five-one-nine-seven-one.
…the young man did too.
And the orderly who had helped Julia to her car…
died in a car accident on February 6th, 1989.
Zero-two-zero-six-one-nine-eight-nine.
Zero-two-zero-six-one-nine-eight-nine.
Julia Jayne was like everyone else after she disappeared.
translation.zh: ‎茱莉亚洁恩失踪后跟其他人一样

translation.en: She no longer knew her expiration date, but…
translation.zh: ‎她不再知道自己的死期 但…

translation.en: it seemed like she was cursed to know everyone else's.
translation.zh: ‎她似乎受了诅咒 知道其他人的死期

translation.en: So?
What happened to her?
There's more to the club, you said.
translation.zh: ‎你刚刚说这个社团不只是在讲故事

translation.en: One pretty huge thing, you said.
What is it?
Tell me and maybe I'll finish that story.
translation.zh: ‎快告诉我 或许我就会把故事说完

translation.en: Okay, newbie.
There's an agreement of sorts.
Like a pact.
translation.zh: ‎类似约定 可追溯到社团创立的时候

translation.en: It goes back to the start of the club, whenever that was.
translation.zh: ‎类似约定 可追溯到社团创立的时候 ‎不管那是什么时候

translation.en: We're not just telling stories here.
One of us sitting at this table is going to die first and soon, probably.
translation.zh:
‎坐在这张桌子旁的我们之中
‎有一个人会先死 ‎而且可能就快了

translation.en: I hate it when you say that.
[Anya] The first one of us to croak has a major job to do.
translation.zh:
‎我们之中第一个过世的人
‎有个重要的任务

translation.en: A responsibility of sorts.
To do everything they can to reach out from the other side.
Tell the others what to expect.
So…
has one shown up?
Anyone gotten, you know, a sign?
Oh, yeah. We have proof of the afterlife.
translation.zh: ‎有 我们能证明来生真的存在

translation.en: Happened a couple of weeks ago.
Now we just meet out of habit.
I mean, I have.
I've seen a sign.
-No, you haven't. -[Anya] Horse shit.
[Ilonka] See, you guys are thinking about this all wrong.
translation.zh: ‎瞧见没？你们的思考角度都不对

translation.en: What happens after death?
You don't even know where you're standing.
translation.zh: ‎你们连自己目前身处的地方都不了解

translation.en: There's so many stories about this place, this exact house, in fact.
translation.zh: ‎这里有好多故事 ‎事实上在这间屋子里

translation.en: Stories about people who thought they were going to die but didn't.
translation.zh:
‎曾经有些人以为自己快死了
‎但是后来却没有

translation.en: I could tell you those stories.
translation.zh: ‎我可以讲那些故事给你们听

translation.en: Stories for another night if you'll have me.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们愿意让我参与
‎我改天晚上再说

translation.en: I'll even do your pact.
translation.zh: ‎我甚至愿意加入你们的约定

translation.en: If it's me, if I'm the first to go,
translation.zh: ‎如果是我 我第一个离世

translation.en: I will stand against that veil
and I will push, and scream, and wail until you hear me.
translation.zh: ‎又推又叫又哭 直到你们听见为止

translation.en: And I will scream the truth.
I promise.
You don't have to be such a drama queen about it.
That was a pretty good story. You make it up?
translation.zh: ‎那个故事很精彩 是你虚构的吧？

translation.en: I did.
Bet you could have been a writer.
Still could.
It's not all made up, though, is it?
What do you mean?
The others, they like it here, but they don't really get it.
translation.zh:
‎其他人喜欢这里
‎但他们其实不了解这个地方

translation.en: They don't take the time.
translation.zh: ‎他们没有花时间去认识这里

translation.en: Don't ever look for very long at these pictures.
translation.zh: ‎完全没有正眼看过这些照片

translation.en: Don't like to think about it, I guess, but, uh… me, I'm different.
translation.zh: ‎我猜他们是不想去想 但我不一样

translation.en: And I've spent hours and hours looking at these photos,
translation.zh: ‎我花了不少时间看过这些照片

translation.en: thinking about the people in them and looking at their names.
translation.zh: ‎思考其中的人物 看着他们的名字

translation.en: Names like Julia Jayne.
translation.zh: ‎例如茱莉亚洁恩的名字 ‎（茱莉亚洁恩）

translation.en: So how much of that story was true?
translation.zh: ‎那个故事有多少比例是真的？

translation.en: I found her story researching thyroid cancer.
translation.zh: ‎我搜索甲状腺癌时发现她的故事

translation.en: She had it and she was here at Brightcliffe,
translation.zh: ‎她罹患甲状腺癌 曾住在布莱克里夫

translation.en: class of '68.
And the police reports are real too.
She did disappear, but only for a week,
translation.zh: ‎她的确消失了 但只失踪了一周

translation.en: and she did come back.
And she walked right through those front doors in full remission.
translation.zh: ‎她从前门走进来 疾病完全缓解

translation.en: And she said… She said it was because of this place.
translation.zh: ‎她说是因为这个地方的缘故

translation.en: That she found something here and it cured her.
translation.zh: ‎她在这里找到某个东西 治愈了她

translation.en: I mean, she could be alive somewhere for all I know.
You didn't pick this place out of a hat, did you?
You're here because of that story.
There's so much more to this place than you guys know.
translation.zh:
‎这个地方的故事
‎比你们知道的还要多很多

translation.en: I mean, maybe we could find out together, but…
translation.zh: ‎或许我们可以一起调查 但…

translation.en: Yeah, you're right. That's why I'm here.
translation.zh: ‎没错 你说得对 那就是我的来意

translation.en: I'm going to live.
Yeah.
We should, uh…
We should probably head back up.
Just in case the night nurse does her rounds.
I… I'm going to stay a bit.
Take a good look, like you said.
Spend a quiet minute with these kids.
translation.zh: ‎跟这些年轻人安静地待上一会儿

translation.en: Okay. Well, good night.
Good night, Kevin.
♪ And I don't even own a TV ♪
